# thinkai-quantum

Python library for Think AI - O(1) AI System.

## Installation

```bash
pip install thinkai-quantum
```

## Usage

```python
from thinkai_quantum import ThinkAI

ai = ThinkAI()
response = ai.query('What is consciousness?')
print(response)
```

## CLI Usage

```bash
think-ai chat
```
